Welcome to Social Gym’s documentation!¶

class src.environment.ros_social_gym.RosSocialEnv(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

A ros-based social navigation environment for OpenAI gym supporting MultiAgent training.

A lot of the documentation is taken from https://pettingzoo.farama.org/content/environment_creation/ which is almost entirely about supporting multiple agents in the environment.

render(mode='human')¶

Depends on RVIZ for visualization, no render method
